item.title: My first yarn package
item.description: I wrote my first yarn package (kinda for fun) yesterday. It’s strange how I’ve been consuming packages for the past 2 years but never went to the other side of the table i.e. writing a package. As of now, I haven’t published my package but I’m omw. So, how did I create a package? It just felt like the usual… I followed the yarn docs. One difference (compared to my usual activities) was I couldn’t do import { .
